def powr(a, n):
    ans = 1
    while n:
        if n & 1:
            ans *= a
            ans = ans % 9
        a *= a
        a = a % 9
        n //= 2
    return ans % 9
t = int(input())
for _ in range(t):
    (a, n) = [int(i) for i in input().strip().split()]
    val = pow(a, n, 9)
    if not val:
        val = 9
    print(val)

import sys

def ds(n):
    if n % 9:
        return n % 9
    else:
        return 9
t = int(input())
i = 0
while t > i:
    (a, n) = map(int, input().split())
    a = ds(a)
    ans = pow(a, n, 9)
    print(ds(ans))
    i += 1

    print(9 if result == 0 else result)

from math import sqrt
import sys
t = int(input())
while t:
    s = 0
    y = 0
    (a, n) = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().split())
    x = pow(a, n, 9)
    if x == 0:
        s = 9
    else:
        while x or s > 9:
            if x == 0:
                x = s
                s = 0
            s = s + x % 10
            x = x // 10
    print(s)
    t = t - 1

        print(val)
